channel.title: Tools on Wildland Fire Data Library
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Wildland Fire Data Library

item.title: Community Wildfire Protection Plan Portal and Data Library
item.description:
The CWPP Portal and Data Library offers a range of resources for wildfire risk mitigation practitioners and researchers. Data encompass 20,000+ records of individualsâ€™ participation in 1,000+ CWPPs in 11 states of the fire-prone US West, attributes of individuals and plans, and the plan documents themselves.

Visit the CWPP Data Library website here! (https://fireadapted.org/cwpp-database/)

item.title: Explore Your Wildfire Risk
item.description: Use this tool to explore location specific wildfire risk. Includes grant-writing assistance Visit the Wildfire Risk website here! (https://wildfirerisk.org/explore)
